body.name: The Drop Women's Britt Tiered Maxi Tent Dress
features: Model is 5'10"/178 cm and wearing a size S
This maxi dress measures 48"/ 122 cm long

Flawlessly flowy tiers give movement to this easy maxi dress. Cut from buttery smooth Tencel lyocell blend featuring on-seam side pockets and hidden button adjustable length straps which can be worn crossed for added edge. Slip on your favorite flats and kick back in comfort and style.
body.description: The Drop partners with international influencers to design of-the-moment collections that could release at any instant-and are gone in 30 hours or less. Pair these designs with everyday pieces from Staples by The Drop to create your own desirable look.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #21,472 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #316 in Women's Casual Dresses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy & Cute
reviews.reviewText: I got this dress for my beach vacation - and love it. I think it's flattering and fun - the skirt is kinda swingy and playful. And it has pockets - which I need - mom here and I need kleenexes and my phone on me and don't usually get my own purse because I'm stuck with a diaper bag. It isn't see through at all and it was not too heavy for the heat of Mexico. I loved the blue but the other colors weren't really me otherwise I'd own it in multiple colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this sundress today!!!
reviews.reviewText: It's soft and flowy but still flattering. It has legit pockets. Not those cheapo pockets you can't put things in. Adjustable button straps. For my height (5'4" AND A HALF) It's the perfect midi length - not too short. I can't get over how comfortable the fabric is. I havent washed it yet, but so far I'm in love. I purchased the mushroom color.EDIT: over a year later...I've worn and washed it many times and I'm still in love with this dress. Holds up well in the wash and I even toss it in the dryer. No noticeable shrinkage. Color has held up well but it has faded from normal wash and wear just a little (to be expected). Noteworthy: it is kind of a heavy material (densely woven fabric...good quality) so it isn't super cool above 80°F weather, it got a little heavy and hot...but I still adore this dress and have purchased it in other colors over the course of the year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! Mushroom color lovely in person
reviews.reviewText: I now own this dress in two colors and absolutely LOVE it. I have black and mushroom. I bought the black first a size or two up because I have a pear shape figure and the hip rarely fits me if I go by the bodice size of a dress. I could have gone true to size here bc the cut of the skirt is fuller- super flowy and fun… with pockets! The bodice in the larger size is super big but I will alter it down instead of exchange bc I love the flow of the skirt.The color of the mushroom is lighter in the model photos. I’m glad I took a chance on it! My photo is the mushroom color next to an Amazon box and an off/white tray in warm lighting to help you gauge the color. It is deeper and warmer than the model photos. I went true to size in this color and the skirt is still flowy and fun.Until I alter the gap under the arms, I’ll wear a lightweight blouse tied at the waist.Pros:Fabric! Gorgeous natural fiber, soft, nice drape, breathes/coolAdjustable strapsPocketsFlowy skirtElastic back for ease and movementLengthCons:The top gaps on the sides (under the arms) *so much* no matter the size (hence the 4 stars). Despite the fabric being a non-stretch woven, the pattern could’ve been cut to avoid this- especially with the elastic back. Make it fitted and add an elastic back, or do neither- both is redundant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful fabric falls beautifully ..
reviews.reviewText: I love this dress. I had previously purchased a black one and it is very flattering on my mature figure. The brown one is gorgeous too. Well made, beautifully finished. A credit to Indian manufacture. Thank you. A+++ I will add to this that I have now purchased two more of these lovely garments, a dark kakhi green and the one named 'ginger'. The ginger is more of a beige colour, but like the others, it falls beautifuly and gracefully from my shoulders. So well made and beautifully finished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy xl. I tried this dress and could hardly get out of it, had to do some acrobatics. Keeping it only because of the lovely fabric. It is too long for me, so I will use the last layer of the length and redesign it to fit my boobs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This will be your go to sundress this summer
reviews.reviewText: I love this sundress. It is very slimming. I purchased the orange striped dress. The orange is a lighter orange, more like a canteloupe color but very pretty. There are so many wonderful things about this dress.It has pockets! The straps can be shortened and can be crisscrossed in the back for a different look. I am 5'3 so I will have it shortened 5-6 inches. I like my dresses to hit mid calf. I usually wear a 22/24 dress size and purchased the 3X. I could have gone with the 2X. You can wear a shirt underneath if you desire.The material is soft and very comfortable. I purchased this dress during Prime Days and got a great price.This dress would be a fun addition to your summer wardrobe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, flattering, pockets!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dress to wear out for dinner at the beach this summer and liked it so much it went everywhere. I got many compliments on the royal blue color, and the length looked nice with strappy sandals. I was concerned about the neckline, but it was high enough that it didn't display too much me when I sat down. Because of the strappy top, I usually wore a light sweater when we went to air conditioned eateries. The pockets were a big plus for carrying small items. The stretchy bodice was form fitting enough to be flattering and loose enough to be comfortable. I used the extra buttonholes on the straps to adjust the length of the straps, so I didn't need to move any buttons. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Drop Women's Britt Tiered Maxi Tent Dress ($59.90)I am 5'4, 190lbs and usually wear 16/18 and ordered the L. Lovely color, fit and material. I ordered this through "Try Before You Buy" ended up returning it as I do not think this is a $60 dress. Maybe $30 but not $60.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super comfy, well fitting, great material
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight but sturdy and durable material. I wore this dress all summer because the heat was so insanely unbearable but this dress kept me cool and it's really pretty. It fits well, true to size, not too long either. I would say it's worth the price but I did get it when it was on sale so

Lo pedí Xl y me queda muy bien, pero 75 kg y mido 156 cm y no lo arrastro. La tela se ve de buena calidad y es pesada y me encanta que tenga bolsillos. Otra cosa que me encantó es que los tirantes se pueden ajustar. Muy buena compra, sin duda lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Traumhaft. Toller Stoff toller Schnitt, alles super
reviews.reviewText: Hatte bissl Bammel weil ich bei jeder guten Rezension denke sie sei ein Fake und vom Lieferanten selbst geschrieben aber habe es trotzdem gewagt. Das Kleid hat einen tollen dicken Stoff und sieht meiner Meinung nach noch besser aus als auf den Bildern. Ich bin so begeistert und werde, wie viele andere hier auch, das Kleid noch in vielen anderen Farben bestellen!!!KLARE KAUF EMPFEHLUNG! und keine Sorge, ich bin ein ECHTER Käufer! :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Bellissimo abito per l'estate anche in città
reviews.reviewText: Ho approfittato di uno sconto per comprare questo abito ad un prezzo super. L'abito è bellissimo, il tessuto è consistente ma fresco, non lascia trasparire la biancheria sottostante e resta ben sistemato sul corpo pur avendo un bello scollo. La spallina copre benissimo il reggiseno e ha anche tre bottoncini che consentono di regolare la lunghezza e la profondità dello scollo a perfezione. Io non sono molto alta, tuttavia pur essendo lungo non ho ravvisato la necessità di farlo accorciare dalla sarta. Il colore che ho preso è bellissimo, un delicato beige che però non è smorto ma molto elegante e un evergreen che sono sicura resterà molto tempo nel mio armadio. Da vacanza ma anche da città (ovviamente magari non per l'ufficio) sarà un compagno di uscite molto confortevole anche per la presenza di due taschine laterali. Super raccomandato!
Très jolie robe , est identique à la photo, me va bien , et pour le prix je ne me voyais pas ne pas l’acheter
